name: Nohzdyve
description:
Nohzdyve is a game made as an easter egg for the 2018 interactive film Bandersnatch in the science fiction anthology series Black Mirror. One of the topics is UK game development in the 1980s for the Spectrum and Nohzdyve is one of the games featured in the story. Made by the fictional company Tuckersoft, the game was made available online along with the film to be played on a ZX Spectrum or emulator.

It is a simple arcade game where character jumps from a high balcony and falls down endlessly. The character can only be steered left or right when falling. Eyeballs need to be collected for points and teeth need to be avoided. A collision with a wall or a pair of teeth is lethal immediately. The character has three lives.

shot.caption: Start of the game: jumping off the balcony.
